column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Every single dish was fantastic - really EVERY DISH!! Some of the highlights were the stuffed mushrooms
column5: and the bacon wrapped dates. For dessert
column8: and the seasonal sorbet (prickly pear). The desserts are perfectly sized - so you can order several! I almost forgot to mention the sangria - abundant choices of red
column9: white and different fruit flavors. Our server Linsey M was great - very friendly and helpful with our menu questions. Love the intimate atmosphere of the restaurant. We look forward to returning and trying even more items from the extensive menu.
